AppDescription: Crypto Tracker is a web application that allows you to track your crypto currency portfolio at a glance.

Settings.CurrencyDescription: Change the base currency used throughout this app and the values will automatically adjust.
Settings.ThemeDescription: Personalise your experience by choosing a theme.
Settings.LanguageDescription: Updating the language will also change things such as date formatting
Settings.UiScaleDescription: Change the size of the UI to be larger or smaller.
